title: Justice punch galio build
body:
{{champion:3}} Justice Punch!!
TLD keystone
5% movement quints
{{item:3087}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3083}} 

with the additional movement from items/runes/masteries you wont need boots since you will have 400+ movement

The idea behind this build is simple flank the enemy and justice punch em into pieces all the effects are dealing aoe damage and add up to a huge amount
330 Justice punch 
300  Passive
190 TLD
150 Sheen proc
120 Shiv
110 Ludens

Totaling 1200 damage in aoe and applying a knockup and a slow 

If we add in additional scaling from mr runes crital shiv proc and 2 sunfire ticks it can deal close to 1500 aoe damage 

It's a silly build but it's just for fun 


PS
you can do something similar with {{champion:432}} and his meep attack justice meep !!!!

replies.body: So what happens when you justice punch a garen?
You heal him. Everyone knows Garen feeds on justice and righteousness

thats funny cos i just flattened a jinx with this build in nexus siege

literal oneshot rofl
